moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Local NBD Server for Remote Disks
moduleMetadataJson.description:
Maps remote disks and logical volumes to a local Network Block
        Device server. Allows for forensic tools to be executed on the remote disk directly.
author: Wesley McGrew <wesley@mcgrewsecurity.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DEVICE
options.description: Device to map (use enum_drives for possible names)
